intension: Design an engaging poster to promote a special discount for souvenirs at the Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) 2024. The poster should incorporating imagery related to AI, machine learning, and advanced algorithms. Use a color of blue and green to represent technology and innovation. Ensure the poster prominently features the CVPR 2024 and include text that reads : 'Unlock exclusive discounts on CVPR souvenirs!'
globalcaption: The image features a green background with a white and black logo for the Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) 2024. The logo is prominently displayed in the center of the image. \n\nIn addition to the main logo, there are several smaller logos scattered around the image. Some of these logos are located near the top left corner, while others are positioned in the top right corner and the bottom left corner. The presence of these smaller logos suggests that the CVPR 2024 conference is likely an event with multiple sponsors or partners.
keywords: algorithms, artificial, automation, business, computer, digital, electronic, electronics, innovation, intelligence, machine, program, programming, robot, software, solution, technology, poster

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a green background with a black and white geometric shape in the center. The shape is a combination of a square and a circle, creating a unique and interesting visual effect. The black and white color scheme adds a sense of contrast to the overall composition, making the shape stand out against the green background
